entry.tran: 用多种语言表达的; (能)使用多种语言的
entry.def: Multilingual means involving several different languages.

entry.tran: 懂多种语言的，能说多种语言的
entry.def: A multilingual person is able to speak more than two languages very well.

example.tran: 他招聘了两个懂多种语言的工程师。

means.word_mean: 1. using or knowing more than one language;
